channel.title: Shop Troubles [pi]
channel.description:
Let me get straight to the point. I followed a tutorial guide on how to add a shop and successfully add items into. Everything works perfect its shows the price and the item and etc...
But my only problem with the shop is when you click the item you want and you select how many you want like 1,5,10,100 etc... It won't trade it to you at all.
If someone could please give me information on what to do or what folder to link in I would really appreciate it.
Here is an example of what I mean [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/303gvp3.jpg[/img] So i buy the item like I said before just to make that clear. Nothing.... [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/9un66a.jpg[/img]

item.title: Shop Troubles [pi]
item.dc:creator: @frevea frevea
item.description:
@frevea wrote:

Let me get straight to the point. I followed a tutorial guide on how to add a shop and successfully add items into. Everything works perfect its shows the price and the item and etc…

But my only problem with the shop is when you click the item you want and you select how many you want like 1,5,10,100 etc… It won’t trade it to you at all.

If someone could please give me information on what to do or what folder to link in I would really appreciate it.

Here is an example of what I mean

303gvp3.jpg746×467

So i buy the item like I said before just to make that clear.
Nothing…
